descriptionHtml:
This is a little idea I had for about a month ago. This mod add 5 tiers of dwarven implant to the game.

Requirements:
Dawnguard

What it does:
leg: increase stamina and stamina regen rate and speed for how fast you walk
heart: carry weight increase health regen rate and health increase
arm:weapons do more damage
mages head: mana regen increase mana increase all spells cheeper
craftsman head: lockpicking increase crafting skills(smithing,alchamy,enchanting)

How to get them

The first tier you craft at any forge.
Any after that you have to go to the tuning and application table at Deep Folk Crossing north east of markarth

The recipe for the 5th tier is here cause the recipe is long and the text gets to small to read and doesnt fit all of it.

All of the 4th tier implants
4 ulimate health potions
8 dwarven gears
8 dwarven oil
8 frost salts
8 nirnroot
8 ulimate stamina potions
8 void salts
12 dwarven ingots
16 unfilled black soul gems
40 fire salts

steam work shop page if you prefer that
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=267729129&tscn=1402155423
author: rms1314
